issue.title: [CF 138] Conditions not being saved properly...
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: Attaching a saved variables file/screenshot will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved.
Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create a new buff for 'raid;party;player'
2. Create a condition for target friendly and/or health below less than or equal to 100%
3. Click okay, go back and right click on the conditions and it will be set to 'player' and not 'target'

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

4.0.0b6

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Please provide any additional information below.

PS  It would be great if there was a stacks condition so I didn't have to use hidden buttons. :)


> Posted by CurseForge user abletron | Imported from CurseForge issue #138 | Raw

comments.body:
Will be fixed in the next beta version. Thanks!
